name: MultiSend
description: Multi Send - Allows to batch multiple transactions into one.

functionDecorators.name: multiSend
functionDecorators.description: Sends multiple transactions and reverts all if one fails.

parameterDecorators.name: transactions
parameterDecorators.description: Encoded transactions. Each transaction is encoded as a packed bytes of operation as a uint8 with 0 for a call or 1 for a delegatecall (=> 1 byte), to as a address (=> 20 bytes), value as a uint256 (=> 32 bytes), data length as a uint256 (=> 32 bytes), data as bytes. see abi.encodePacked for more information on packed encoding.
